POOL().details: Returns the address of the lending pool where this aToken is used*

UNDERLYING_ASSET_ADDRESS().details: Returns the address of the underlying asset of this aToken (E.g. WETH for aWETH)*

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the allowance of spender on the tokens owned by owner

params.spender: The user allowed to spend the owner's tokens

returns._0: The amount of owner's tokens spender is allowed to spend*

approve(address,uint256).details: Allows `spender` to spend the tokens owned by _msgSender()

params.spender: The user allowed to spend _msgSender() tokens

approveDelegation(address,uint256).details: delegates borrowing power to a user on the specific debt token

params.amount: the maximum amount being delegated. Delegation will still respect the liquidation constraints (even if delegated, a delegatee cannot force a delegator HF to go below 1)*
params.delegatee: the address receiving the delegated borrowing power

balanceOf(address).details: Calculates the current user debt balance

returns._0: The accumulated debt of the user*

borrowAllowance(address,address).details: returns the borrow allowance of the user

params.toUser: The user to give allowance to

params.amount: The amount of debt tokens getting burned*
params.user: The address of the user getting his debt burned

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Decreases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()
params.subtractedValue: The amount being subtracted to the allowance

getAverageStableRate().details: Returns the average stable rate across all the stable rate debt

getIncentivesController().details: Returns the address of the incentives controller contract*

getSupplyData().details: Returns the principal and total supply, the average borrow rate and the last supply update timestamp*

getTotalSupplyAndAvgRate().details: Returns the the total supply and the average stable rate*

getTotalSupplyLastUpdated().details: Returns the timestamp at which the total supply was updated*

getUserLastUpdated(address).details: Returns the timestamp of the last user action

getUserStableRate(address).details: Returns the stable rate of the user

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Increases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.addedValue: The amount being added to the allowance
params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()

params.debtTokenDecimals: The decimals of the debtToken, same as the underlying asset's
params.incentivesController: The smart contract managing potential incentives distribution
params.pool: The address of the lending pool where this aToken will be used
params.underlyingAsset: The address of the underlying asset of this aToken (E.g. WETH for aWETH)

mint(address,address,uint256,uint256).details: Mints debt token to the `onBehalfOf` address. -  Only callable by the LendingPool - The resulting rate is the weighted average between the rate of the new debt and the rate of the previous debt

params.amount: The amount of debt tokens to mint
params.onBehalfOf: The address receiving the debt tokens
params.rate: The rate of the debt being minted*
params.user: The address receiving the borrowed underlying, being the delegatee in case of credit delegate, or same as `onBehalfOf` otherwise

principalBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the principal debt balance of the user from

returns._0: The debt balance of the user since the last burn/mint action*

transfer(address,uint256).details: Being non transferrable, the debt token does not implement any of the standard ERC20 functions for transfer and allowance.*

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Executes a transfer of token from sender to recipient, if _msgSender() is allowed to do so

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred

userdoc.notice: Implements a stable debt token to track the borrowing positions of users at stable rate mode
